subject: Re: [junit] testing WebStart apps
msgSnippet: Sean Machin wrote:  ... I think you are /writing/ WebStartUnit... although not necessarily. Use me as a virtual pair. Describe how you would test this
messageBody:
Sean Machin wrote:

<snip />

>
> Thanks for the response Jason,
> but WebStart is just the mechanism for launching Java apps, we use it
> here
> to launch our suite of Swing based client apps. I would like to test
> successful downloading and launching of the apps from the server
> via WebStart, I guess I am looking for WebStartUnit...

I think you are /writing/ WebStartUnit... although not necessarily.

Use me as a virtual pair. Describe how you would test this manually.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
